lead_paragraph: It only counts as one win, though the Miami Heat had to work twice as hard to get it.

headline.print_headline: Wade, Heat Beat Raptors in OT After Lowry's Halfcourt Heave

snippet: It only counts as one win, though the Miami Heat had to work twice as hard to get it....
